news.title: Massive Attack Promise New Music for 2026
news.summary: Just don’t expect to find the “cache of work created in the recent past” on Spotify

news.title: Charli XCX Announces New Album Wuthering Heights, Shares New Song “Chains of Love”: Listen
news.summary: The musician’s work on the new Emerald Fennell film inspired her to make a full-length follow-up to Brat

news.title: Daft Punk’s Thomas Bangalter Features on Orelsan’s New Song “Yoroï”: Listen
news.summary: Bangalter co-wrote, co-produced, and played bass on the French rapper’s La fuite en avant track

news.title: Sharp Pins, Been Stellar, Lip Critic, and More Playing Abortion Access Benefit Concerts
news.summary: Tobacco City, Widowspeak, Shannon Shaw, @, and Diners are also among the bands playing Noise for Now benefit shows in various U.S. cities

news.title: Tobias Jesso Jr. Announces First Album in 10 Years, Shares New Video: Watch
news.summary: Dakota Johnson and Riley Keough star in the music video for comeback song “I Love You”

news.title: Little Feat Announce Final Tour, Share New Song With Inara George: Listen
news.summary: The Last Farewell Tour will take the roots-rock stalwarts around the southern United States starting in April, with a global run of dates to follow

news.title: NewJeans to Return to Label Following Legal Dispute
news.summary: A South Korean district court ruled that the K-pop group must honor its contract with Hybe imprint ADOR, which extends through 2029
